ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:1.1_0: having sexual intercourse with the seven kinds of offenses. Avoiding of the seven classes of offenses, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:1.2_0: He has sexual intercourse with the four kinds of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:1.3_0: They may be expelled in the chapter on offenses entailing expulsion, and there may be a serious offense in the shoulder of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, urinates, or spit in water, consumes, and engages in all the offenses of the seven classes of offenses.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:2.2_0: If a nun, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, that is to say, the seven offenses entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.12:3.1_0: The fourth section for recitation on inclusive is finished.
